$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/about.text: This plugin calculates the size of installed plugins, themes and languages. It adds a tab //Plugin Info// to the [[$:/ControlPanel]] – the one with the {{$:/core/images/info-button}} icon.
$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/about.title: $:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/about

$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/history.text:
!! History

* ''1.0.1'' -- 2023-12-31 -- feature update
** No plugin dependencies anymore: 
*** //rpn// is no longer needed.
*** //Harvey Balls// is an option now.
** MIT license

* ''0.0.9'' -- 2019-03-10 -- initial release
$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/history.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/history.title: $:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/history

$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/icon.text: <svg class="em-icon harvey-ball ball-complex" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill-rule="evenodd" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 128 128" role="img" aria-labelledby="title desc"><title id="title">{{$:/language/HarveyBalls/complex/title}}</title><desc id="desc">{{$:/language/HarveyBalls/complex/desc}}</desc><path d="M64 128C28.654 128 0 99.346 0 64 0 28.654 28.654 0 64 0c35.346 0 64 28.654 64 64 0 35.346-28.654 64-64 64zm48-64c0 .19-48 0-48 0V16c26.51 0 48 21.49 48 48z"/></svg>
$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/icon.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/icon.title: $:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/icon

$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/plugin-in.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/ \define plugin-table(type) <$set name="plugin-type" value="""$type$"""> <$set name="qualified-state" value=<>> <$list filter="[!has[draft.of]plugin-type[$type$]sort[description]]" emptyMessage=<> >
{{||$:/core/ui/Components/plugin-info}}
{{||$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/template}} \end <> <>
$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/plugin-in.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/plugin-in.title: $:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/plugin-info
$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/plugin-in.caption: {{$:/core/images/info-button}} Plugin Info

$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/readme.text:
!! Plugin Size

{{$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/about}}

The same information can be found on [[$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/plugin-info]].

!!! Categories (character count)

* <<HB5>> up to 25 k
* <<HB8>> up to 50 k
* <<HB13>> up to 100 k
* <<HB21>> up to 500 k 
* <<HB34>> more than 500 k

!!! Optional graphics

Size indicating icons are shown if my other plugin [[Harvey Balls|https://tid.li/tw5/plugins.html#%24%3A%2Fplugins%2Ftelmiger%2FHarveyBalls]] is installed.

{{$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/history}}
$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/readme.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/readme.title: $:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/readme

$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/styles.cs.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/styles.cs.title: $:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/styles.css

$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/template.text: <$let size={{{ [get[text]length[]] }}} iconS={{{ [compare:number:gt[25000]then[obvious]else[simple]] }}} iconM={{{ [compare:number:gt[50000]then[complicated]else] }}} iconL={{{ [compare:number:gt[100000]then[complex]else] }}} icon={{{ [compare:number:gt[500000]then[chaotic]else] }}} sizek={{{ [divide[1000]fixed[1]] }}} > <$let commentS={{{ [match[obvious]then[small]else[tiny]] }}} commentM={{{ [match[complicated]then[medium]else] }}} commentL={{{ [match[complex]then[big]else] }}} comment={{{ [match[chaotic]then[gigantic]else] }}} > <$transclude $variable="HarveyBall" variant=<> title=<>/> – plugin size: <> k characters (<>)
$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/template.title: $:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/template
$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/template.creator: Thomas Elmiger

$:/plugins/telmiger/support.text:
!! Support the Author ''Hi!'' I’m Thomas, the author of [[tid.li/tw5/plugins.html|https://tid.li/tw5/plugins.html]]. Feedback is always welcome, as well as funding for maintenance, support and new projects :) --- !!! One Time Support If using my plugins just makes you happy, consider a one time payment via ~PayPal to reward the effort: https://www.paypal.me/telmiger --- !!! Permanent Support If my tools make you more productive or save you time in your job or your everyday life, you can support me as a Patron: https://www.patreon.com/telmiger --- !!! Thank You Substantial parts of my availabe time go to the deveopment of useful plugins for [[TiddlyWiki|https://tiddlywiki.com/]]. – Many others do the same and I would like to thank them all, especially [[Jeremy Ruston|https://tiddlywiki.com/#JeremyRuston]] and all the active members of the community! //Hereby I promise to share future revenues (if any) with other developers who’s works I use or who inspired me.// If you like my work, I would be very happy to hear from you. ''Thank you very much for your support!''
//Thomas// https://thomas-elmiger.ch
$:/plugins/telmiger/support.title: $:/plugins/telmiger/support
$:/plugins/telmiger/support.creator: Thomas Elmiger
